alert.note: Alert for Long Island; New York City (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 07 at 6:37AM EDT until April 07 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR NEW YORK CITY AND LONG ISLAND... The National Weather Service in Upton has issued a Red Flag Warning for New York City and Long Island, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM EDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...New York City and Long Island. * TIMING...Late this morning into early this evening. * WINDS...Northwest 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 21 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 50s. * LIGHTNING...None. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are expected or occurring. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels will create a significantly elevated fire growth potential.
